thread.title: ChartIQ Responds to Growth, Names Christian Hall as COO

author: cnbc.com
title: ChartIQ Responds to Growth, Names Christian Hall as COO
text:
CHARLOTTESVILLE, Va., May 14, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Charlottesville-based fintech, ChartIQ , has appointed Christian Hall as its new chief operating officer. Christian has over twenty years experience building and transforming software, and leading the product and engineering teams building it. He comes to ChartIQ from Equifax, where he led both product and technology innovation teams. In his new role, Christian will lead expansion efforts around the financial industry’s adoption of ChartIQ’s latest product offering, Finsemble .
ChartIQ, a well known capital markets technology provider, is currently expanding their focus to a platform that modernizes complex workflows for financial organizations. For institutional firms and their users, Finsemble brings together a wide array of custom and third party applications into a single, unified, desktop experience, where all sources of data are interconnected, synchronized, and well organized. The new focus delivers an “open terminal” experience to users and is studded with modern technology that helps traders see, act, and respond faster to issues than ever before.
Speaking of ChartIQ's position in the market, Hall said, “ChartIQ’s software has been redefining user experiences in capital markets for the last five years and has gained traction incredibly quickly given the company’s size. With many of the industry’s leading institutions already using ChartIQ products, the potential to grow the new Finsemble product line is an exciting challenge. We have seen strong interest from the market and I believe we will see significant adoption as we roll out the product and invest in our partner ecosystem. Joining was an opportunity not to be missed.”
Hall is passionate about strategy, team dynamics, and design, and has built systems for large institutions and well-known brands in consumer goods, publishing, industrial materials, and financial services. Learn more about ChartIQ ’s leadership team here .
About ChartIQ
ChartIQ builds powerful, lightweight financial solutions that modernize the user experience for capital market institutions, investment banks, and brokerage firms around the world. Harnessing the power of HTML5, ChartIQ specializes in building advanced time-series financial charts, technical analysis tools, and data agnostic trading platforms. Utilizing powerful APIs, simple SDKs, and an accelerated path to integration, developers can build complex projects quickly and deploy across web, mobile, and desktop with ease. With ChartIQ, customers deliver the most advanced user experience on any device.
ChartIQ is based out of Charlottesville, Virginia, with offices in New York City, London, and Limassol. Founded in 2012, ChartIQ has a global customer base with over 250 financial firms represented. For more info, visit chartiq.com .
